title: AFKers
body:
Has anyone ever thought that there needs to be an easier way to compensate for teammates who either AFK or leave?
I know 90% of you would say yes so i just thought i might put a suggestion out there and hopefully riot responds.

So if a player leaves there should be a button that the player who leaves can press on exiting the game that allows the computer to take over their champion. This player does not receive any rewards at the end of the game but this gives the rest of the team a better chance to win. 

After pressing this button, the player agrees that he/she will not be able to join any games for double the duration of the full game.
If the player decides not to switch their champion over to AI, then they get marked as leaving and get the appropriate penalties. 

Would much appreciate some feed back and thoughts on how to improve this idea so please leave the comments below.
